title: Jooble Job Scraper Input
description: Scrape job listings from Jooble.org by providing search keywords and location, or a direct search URL.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct Jooble search URL to scrape from. If provided, this overrides keyword and region fields. Example: https://jooble.org/SearchResult?ukw=software+engineer&rgns=New+York

keyword.title: Search Keyword
keyword.description: Keyword for job search (e.g., 'software engineer', 'data analyst'). This will be used as the 'ukw' parameter in Jooble search URLs.

region.title: Region/Location
region.description: Location filter for job search (e.g., 'New York', 'London', 'Berlin'). This will be used as the 'rgns' parameter.

maxJobs.title: Maximum Jobs
maxJobs.description: Maximum number of jobs to collect. Set to 0 for unlimited (will stop when no more jobs found).

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of search result pages to scrape. Each page typically contains multiple job listings.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for anti-bot protection. Use Apify Proxy for best results.
